channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: The Twelve Days of Blog-mas: No.12 - Copilot(s) - You're AI Assistant(s)
item.description:
Tally ho!
Now, you didn't really think I would go for 12 without one about Copilot, did you?
Our AI/ML efforts have been on-going for a long time, but very recently, they've gone mainstream. Be aware, though, for now, this space changes frequently, varies by region/market and software version (Windows, Office apps, Edge, etc.). Docs, product names, major and minor functionality are all moving very fast. Do your brain a favor and make some peace with that.
So, what IS Copilot? After working with these technologies a lot recently, I like the simplest explanation: Copilot is your AI a...
